docs.lead_paragraph: Air India said it has set a world record by flying around the world with an all-female crew.

headline.print_headline: Air India Says All-Female Crew Flies Around the World
headline.main: Air India Says All-Female Crew Flies Around the World

docs.snippet: Air India said it has set a world record by flying around the world with an all-female crew....

docs.lead_paragraph: Bahrain's parliament on Sunday approved a constitutional change allowing military courts to try civilians, the kingdom's latest rollback on reforms made after its 2011 Arab Spring protests that likely will stoke an ongoing government crackdown on dissent.

headline.print_headline: Bahrain Parliament Approves Military Trials for Civilians
headline.main: Bahrain Parliament Approves Military Trials for Civilians

docs.snippet: Bahrain's parliament on Sunday approved a constitutional change allowing military courts to try civilians, the kingdom's latest rollback on reforms made after its 2011 Arab Spring protests that likely will stoke an ongoing government crackdown on ...

docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi troops encountered the heaviest clashes yet with Islamic State group fighters Sunday in western Mosul since the start of the new push more than two weeks ago, according to a senior commander.

headline.print_headline: Wave of IS Car Bombs Targets Iraqi Troops in West Mosul
headline.main: Wave of IS Car Bombs Targets Iraqi Troops in West Mosul

docs.snippet: Iraqi troops encountered the heaviest clashes yet with Islamic State group fighters Sunday in western Mosul since the start of the new push more than two weeks ago, according to a senior commander....

docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese Emperor Akihito paid his respects to the late Thai King Bhumibol Adulyadej on Sunday, arriving in Bangkok following a weeklong trip to Vietnam aimed at winning support against Chinese expansionism.

headline.print_headline: Japan's Emperor Pays Respects to Thailand's Late King
headline.main: Japan's Emperor Pays Respects to Thailand's Late King

docs.lead_paragraph: The decision on whether or not to return the Syrian pilot who ejected into Turkey will be made following his treatment, a Turkish Cabinet minister said Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Rescues Pilot of Syrian Jet That Crashed on Border
headline.main: Turkey Rescues Pilot of Syrian Jet That Crashed on Border

docs.snippet: The decision on whether or not to return the Syrian pilot who ejected into Turkey will be made following his treatment, a Turkish Cabinet minister said Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia has arrested six foreigners and one Malaysian for suspected links to militant groups including Islamic State, the police chief said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Malaysia Arrests Seven for Suspected Links to Militant Groups
headline.main: Malaysia Arrests Seven for Suspected Links to Militant Groups

docs.snippet: Malaysia has arrested six foreigners and one Malaysian for suspected links to militant groups including Islamic State, the police chief said on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister Theresa May is unlikely to bow to political expedience in Brexit negotiations but will make up her own mind about what she believes is best and refuse to give ground - that's if past form is anything to go by.

headline.print_headline: Battle-Hardened in Britain, May Prepares for Brexit Talks
headline.main: Battle-Hardened in Britain, May Prepares for Brexit Talks

docs.snippet: British Prime Minister Theresa May is unlikely to bow to political expedience in Brexit negotiations but will make up her own mind about what she believes is best and refuse to give ground - that's if past form is anything to go by....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Israeli newspaper is reporting that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu offered the country's opposition leader a unity government late last year that would promote a regional peace initiative — before backing out.

headline.print_headline: Report: Israeli Leader Briefly Offered Pro-Peace Government
headline.main: Report: Israeli Leader Briefly Offered Pro-Peace Government

docs.snippet: An Israeli newspaper is reporting that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu offered the country's opposition leader a unity government late last year that would promote a regional peace initiative — before backing out....

docs.lead_paragraph: Nigerian pirates have released seven Russian and one Ukrainian sailors after they were captured last month on the cargo ship the BBC Caribbean, Russian news agencies reported on Sunday, citing a human rights activist in Crimea.

headline.print_headline: Pirates in Nigeria Release Russian, Ukrainian Sailors: Agencies
headline.main: Pirates in Nigeria Release Russian, Ukrainian Sailors: Agencies

docs.snippet: Nigerian pirates have released seven Russian and one Ukrainian sailors after they were captured last month on the cargo ship the BBC Caribbean, Russian news agencies reported on Sunday, citing a human rights activist in Crimea....

docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan tightened security in the city of Lahore ahead of a hugely anticipated final of its domestic cricket league on Sunday, pushing ahead with a rare high-profile match despite a recent spike in Islamist violence.

headline.print_headline: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
headline.main: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
